Sass Map Magic

Maps are a powerful data type in Sass — perfect for managing color and scale palettes, framework configuration, data storage, and more. We’ll find ways to integrate maps into any project before we push them to their limits.

  • The main problems with maps, and how we work around them.
  • Automating pattern libraries and style guides based on maps.
